page.title: 12WHEATHAM FARM,Steep Marsh,2
page.content: The Farm is better suited to cattle as it is clay soil and hilly.The farmer and his wife are helped by one full timer and one YTS boy also full time. The farm revolves around the rearing and milking of cattle. This involves the farmer and his wife in a very long and tiring day. Mrs. Amesbury, the farmer's wife,feels that cattle rearing is not a money-making business and is hopeful that her farm and the hangers can be turned into a tourist attraction. The hangers are a haven for wild life and rare flowers.She would like to make her farm into a centre for tourists to come and find information on the area and learn more about what there is to see.
